item.title: WLFI increased its ETH holdings by 560.71 coins, at an average price of $3,567.
item.description: On July 24th, as per the monitoring of Onchain Lens, the crypto project WLFI, which belongs to Trump, used 2 million USDC to purchase 560.71 ETH at a price of $3567 per coin.

item.title: EU Diplomat: The EU and the US are moving towards a possible trade agreement, with the US imposing a 15% tariff on EU goods
item.description: On July 24th, EU diplomats stated that the EU and the US are progressing towards a potential trade agreement, and the US's baseline tariff on EU goods is 15%.The potential EU-US agreement may contain exemption clauses for certain EU goods. EU member states will vote on imposing a â‚¬93 billion retaliatory tariff on US goods on Thursday.

item.title: EU Diplomat: If no trade agreement is reached with the United States, the vast majority of EU member states will support using anti-coercion measures
item.description: On July 24th, European Union diplomats expressed that in the absence of a trade agreement with the United States and if the U.S. imposes a 30% tariff, the vast majority of EU member states would be in favor of taking retaliatory measures.

item.title: Tron Inc. will ring the opening bell at Nasdaq on July 24.
item.description: On July 24th, Tron Inc. (Nasdaq: TRON), which is hereinafter referred to as the "Company" and is a leading innovator at the convergence of blockchain, entertainment, and digital assets. Today, it was announced that the Company will ring the opening bell at the Nasdaq Stock Exchange on July 24, 2025 (Thursday).This ceremony will be held at the Nasdaq MarketSite in Times Square, New York City. It will be hosted by Justin Sun, the founder of the TRON blockchain and the global advisor to Tron Inc. This marks a significant stride forward for the company towards the next generation of technology and digital innovation.Tron Inc. (formerly SRM Entertainment, Inc.) is a publicly traded company that is at the forefront of blockchain-integrated financial strategies. As the largest holder of TRON (TRX) tokens among publicly traded companies, Tron Inc. is dedicated to achieving financial transparency and promoting the application of decentralized finance (DeFi) to realize long-term value creati

item.title: Chicago Board Options Exchange Volatility Index Hits Five-Month Low
item.description: On July 24th, the Volatility Index of the Chicago Board Options Exchange (CBOE) reached a five-month low, dropping by 0.86 points to 15.64. (Oriental Fortune Network)

item.title: Bitcoin experienced a brief 0.49% price increase, while the Euro Stoxx 50 Index futures saw its gain expand to 2.4%.
item.description: On July 24th, due to the news that "the US and the EU are close to reaching a 15% tariff agreement", Bitcoin witnessed a transient 0.49% price increase. Meanwhile, the gains of the Europe Stoxx 50 Index futures expanded to 2.4%.

item.title: Spot Gold Falls Below $3390 per Ounce, Daily Decline Reaches 1.21%
item.description: July 24th: The price of spot gold dropped below $3390/oz, with an intraday decrease of 1.21%.New York gold futures also fell below $3400/oz, showing an intraday decline of 1.27% (as reported by Wall Street).

item.title: Coinbase to List JITOSOL, MPLX
item.description: On July 24th, Coinbase will commence the support for the transfer and trading of Jito Staked SOL (JITOSOL) and Metaplex (MPLX), which are two Solana network (SPL token) assets. This will begin at 9 a.m. Pacific Time on July 24, 2025 or later, contingent upon the fulfillment of liquidity conditions.Users are advised not to send the relevant assets through other networks to prevent the loss of funds. The trading pairs of JITOSOL and MPLX will be launched in stages, and support in some regions may be restricted.

item.title: ETH/BTC 24-hour Price Decreased by Over 3%, Currently Trading at 0.03041
item.description: On July 24th, according to HTX market data, the exchange rate of ETH to BTC has seen a 24-hour decline of 3.06% and is currently trading at 0.03041.

item.title: The US and the EU are close to reaching a 15% tariff agreement
item.description: On July 23rd, as per the Financial Times, the US and the EU are on the verge of reaching an agreement on a 15% tariff.The EU and the US will exempt certain products from tariffs, including aircraft, spirits, and medical devices.
